sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Court Record and Document Accessibility Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Court Record and Document Accessibility Act.

sections.heading: Process for access. The General Assembly encourages the Supreme Court to consider establishing a process for access to court files that are limited by statute or court rule that includes standardized forms and provisions for requesting access to documents in court files that are restricted in any ma
sections.text: Process for access. The General Assembly encourages the Supreme Court to consider establishing a process for access to court files that are limited by statute or court rule that includes standardized forms and provisions for requesting access to documents in court files that are restricted in any manner.

sections.heading: Applicability. This Act applies to all court records and documents related to any civil or criminal proceeding brought before any court in this State that are created and maintained by a State court
sections.text: Applicability. This Act applies to all court records and documents related to any civil or criminal proceeding brought before any court in this State that are created and maintained by a State court.
